name: Snake-A-Roid (MiniLD#67)
description:
Snake-A-Roid is an entry for the Ludum Dare MiniLD 67 Jam.

It's a mash-up of Asteroids, Snake and a bit of Breakout for good measure.

Shoot the rocks, collect the power-ups, protect the snake's head.

Rocks will bounce off the snake's body and tail harmlessly though, and you won't collide with yourself either - but your bullets won't go through your body.

Controls are arrow keys to move.. shooting happens automatically.

New version coming soon! Snake-A-Roid
